examples.example: 今年我一定要努力实现自己的目标，让生活更加精彩。

translate.english: This year I must strive hard to achieve my goals and make life even more wonderful.

examples.example: 今年我充满信心，准备迎接各种挑战，并取得好成绩。

translate.english: This year I am full of confidence, ready to meet all kinds of challenges and achieve good results.

examples.example: 今年我希望能去更多的地方旅行，拓宽自己的视野。

translate.english: This year I hope to travel to more places and broaden my vision.
